app-data.title: hello from the other side r
app-data.description: A web host, or web hosting service provider, is a business that provides the technologies and services needed for the website or webpage to be viewed in the Internet. Websites are hosted, or stored, on special computers called servers. ... Most hosting companies require that you own your domain in order to host with them.
